sentences.sContent: The house stands in extensive grounds.
sentences.sCn: 这栋房子占地面积很大。

sentences.sContent: Fire has caused extensive damage to the island’s forests.
sentences.sCn: 大火严重毁坏了岛上的森林。

sentences.sContent: ...Joel Stein wrote　an extensive piece on Millennials and he remains rather optimistic about our potential...
...I would have automatically assumed the man was the best candidate because the position required quite a bit of extensive travel...

exam.question: It is quite necessary for a qualified teacher to have good manners and _________ knowledge.

answer.explain: 句意： 一个称职的教师必须行为端正， 知识渊博。expansive： 扩大的， 膨胀的； intensive： 加强的， 集中的； expensive： 昂贵的。

remMethod.val: 以上两词均来自extend(v. 延长； 伸展)

words.tran: 延伸的；扩大的；长期的；广大的
延长；延期；扩大；伸展；电话分机
延伸；扩大；推广；伸出；给予；使竭尽全力；对…估价

trans.tranOther: large in size, amount, or degree
